application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
description: T.1 Oak - 1.5m Holistic crown reduction to suitable growth points, 10% crown thin, crown lift to 3m from ground level and remove all ivy and deadwood.T.2 Pine -1.5m reduction of lower laterals in line with understory hedge and reduce in height by 1m (or alternatively fell).
